Cruz shook his head and said Rubio knowingly made an inaccurate allegation. "The attack he continues to throw on the military budget. Marco knows very well that I voted to adjust it to increase military spending to $697 billion," said Cruz. "What he said, and said in the last discussion, is simply not true." Rubio criticized Cruz's record of military spending before, as Cruz voted in favour of Paul's proposed budget, which would have led to less defence spending than current projections. However, with regard to a specific point concerning voting for the Rubio Amendment, Cruz is right. (We don't check the truth whether Rubio "knows well" about Cruz's vote.) Cruz specifically mentioned $697 billion, but it is not clear exactly how much of the adjustment Rubio will make that will increase spending.
